original_text: But the Lord had said to Ahijah, ‘Jeroboam's wife will come to visit you. Her son is ill and she will ask you what will happen to him. I will tell you what to say to her. When she comes, she will pretend that she is not the king's wife.’
korean_text: 여호와께서 아히야에게 이르시되 여로보암의 아내가 자기 아들이 병 들었으므로 네게 물으러 오나니 너는 이러이러하게 대답하라 그가 들어올 때에 다른 사람인 체함이니라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord had said to Ahijah
'Jeroboam's wife will come to visit you'
I will tell you what to say to her
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그녀에게 무엇을 말해야 할지 알려주겠다

sentences.original_text: she will pretend that she is not the king's wife'
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 왕의 아내가 아닌 척할 것이다'
